mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FREVIEW_REPLY(REPLYNO, reviewno, id, REPLY, PASSWD, RDATE) VALUES (FREVIEW_REPLY_SEQ.nextval, #{reviewno}, #{id}, #{reply}, #{passwd}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT REPLYNO, reviewno, id, REPLY, PASSWD, RDATE FROM FREVIEW_REPLY ORDER BY REPLYNO ASC
SELECT REPLYNO, reviewno, id, REPLY, PASSWD, RDATE FROM FREVIEW_REPLY WHERE reviewno = #{reviewno} ORDER BY REPLYNO ASC
SELECT REPLYNO, reviewno, id, REPLY, PASSWD, RDATE FROM FREVIEW_REPLY WHERE id = #{id} ORDER BY REPLYNO ASC
SELECT REPLYNO, reviewno, id, REPLY, PASSWD, RDATE FROM FREVIEW_REPLY WHERE REPLYNO = #{replyno}
